Literature.Title: Design and synthesis of cationic antibacterial peptide based on Leucrocin I sequence, antibacterial peptide from crocodile (Crocodylus siamensis) white blood cell extracts
Literature.Author: Yaraksa N, Anunthawan T, Theansungnoen T, Daduang S, Araki T, Dhiravisit A, Thammasirirak S

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:13% Hemolysis=12 µg/ml,Human erythrocytes:11% Hemolysis=24 µg/ml,Human erythrocytes:16% Hemolysis=48 µg/ml
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus epidermidis(MIC=25µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhi(MIC=25µg/ml),Vibrio cholerae(MIC=0.156µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 12228(MIC=>200µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhi DMST 22842(MIC=>200µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=>200µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=>200µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=>200µg/ml),Vibrio cholerae non-O1(MIC=>200µg/ml),Vibrio cholerae non-O139(MIC=>200µg/ml),Human cervical carcinoma HeLa(no activity data),Human cervical carcinoma CaSki(no activity data),Bacillus megaterium(MIC=>64µM),Lysinibacillus sphaericus TISTR 678(MIC=>64µM),Vibrio cholerae(MIC=>64µM),Escherichia coli O157:H7(MIC=>64µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhi(MIC=>64µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhi ATCC 5784(MIC=>64µM)
